content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”masonry-portfolio location-portfolio” css=”.vc_custom_1563615609227{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515636297694{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-6″]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6″]

Our Unique Small Business Website Development Process

If you are pondering about giving your Highett business a digital facelift, then Confetti Design is your professional website development agency of choice! Whether you want a brand-new website, or need a fresh look for your outdated one, our range of website development services compares to none. Our process includes understanding your business and your customers more so that your customers, whether from Highett or anywhere in Australia, will feel at home when browsing through your website.

[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]VIEW MORE OF OUR WORK[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1513007553262{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep”][vc_column]
[vc_column_text el_class=”text-not-caps”]

Confetti Design services in Highett

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563611359536{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

From designing your ecommerce website in Highett to developing a brand that sells, we have all your web design service needs to help you succeed in your business.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

[vc_row_inner el_class=”services-location”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Web Design

[vc_column_text]Looking for good designers and professional developers? Confetti Design offers a hands on design and development Service that will help you accomplish an amazing client experience resulting in great conversions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Branding

[vc_column_text]We provide more than just website development, your branding matters and we can ensure you present a consistent online brand. Making sure all your customer touch-points present the same brand messaging and visuals is our passion.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

SEO

[vc_column_text]Getting your site within the first 3 positions on the first page of Google is every businesses goal. We ensure your website goes live with best practise optimisation and then if you are serious about ranking we can help. Our SEO partner is the best Melbourne based Search Engine Optimisation company we know.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Shopify Developer

[vc_column_text]Shopify is one of the best platforms for e-commerce, no doubt and we are the right people to help you with your online business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563760092820{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}” el_class=”location-slider-portfolio”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1563592372523{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

3 Major types of business websites

[vc_column_text]

Back in the days, it takes quite a lot of resources, skills, and determination to start your own business. Truth is, it still stands true nowadays! The only difference is that now, in the age of the world wide web, you have the opportunity to grow your Highett business into a global one. And you know how—it’s by creating your business website. But what type website should you start?

Confetti Design has listed 3 major types of business websites that can suit your business, as not all businesses are created the same.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Confetti Design understands the need of every business, whether from Highett or anywhere in Melbourne, to out-shine their competition. This is by creating websites that set our clients apart and add value to their customers. Together with our collaborative efforts, experiences, and talents, you can be assured that  your website will not just be aesthetically pleasing but is also giving you the results you are expecting.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608564696{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_01.jpg?id=10889) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564494536257{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Informational websites

When you have a brick-and-mortar business like a spa or a restaurant in Highett, your main reason for creating your website is for more people to go to your Highett shop. Information based websites have the services or menu page, about your business page, and most importantly, your contact page! A good strategy for most business owners for this type of website is that they give promotional discounts to those who will share their website on social media, increasing the awareness about their stores.

Confetti Design creates stunning websites that you’ll surely love, and of course your customers will also admire. We don’t stop at the appearance aspect—we also ensure that your potential customers will easily find you through our SEO services.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608572404{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_02.jpg?id=10890) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564494876706{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

E-commerce website

This is probably the most popular website type nowadays as more and more people prefer shopping at the comfort of their Highett homes instead of going out. E-commerce websites have single or products that buyers can avail online and have them delivered to their doorstep. Your e-commerce web design requires multiple functions such as inventory tracking and shipping functionalities. Platforms such as Woocommerce for WordPress and Shopify are specially made for e-commerce websites.

Confetti Design is an e-commerce website design company in Melbourne that can cater to your website needs. We have designed, together with our talented website developers, numerous e-commerce websites that are not only pretty—they also convert!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608578524{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_03.jpg?id=10891) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg3 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564494642343{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Lead generation websites

There are websites that are used to generate prospective clients into customers. These websites have excellent content about a certain topic or service, and by the end of their web pages, they will ask the website visitor to sign up for email newsletters or leave their contact details. After the visitors leave their contact details or signs up for the newsletter, the company will then have the opportunity to pitch their services personally to the leads.

Confetti Design knows every element that your lead generation website in Highett needs! From outstanding colours to extraordinary call to action buttons, we keep your goal in mind while creating your website.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563760068482{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563760062091{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564495033969{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Confetti Design caters to clients from Cheltenham, Caufield,  Elwood and nearby areas. Our unparalleled web design and development services have proven to work with our clients!

Below are the small business web design testimonials from our valued clients.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1563760050409{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Stacey Currie

I had been quoted from $1k to $10k, I had no idea who to trust. Luckily I was referred by someone I trust 100%, who trust Johannah 100%, and I know why. I am very grateful.

Stacey Currie

I still can’t believe my vision is here; I feel extremely proud of my new website and branding. I felt embarrassed of my old branding but now I am so proud to share what Johannah and the team created.

Personal Brand Expert

One feature I loved was Johannah's availability and prompt response to any query no matter how big or small. Confetti's service is always with genuine smile and her positive attitude and outlook made the process fun!

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

I am impressed with how well Johannah nailed my brief without one face-to-face meeting. I highly recommend her to create a website you will love.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah has produced a beautiful and effective new website for our small business in a short amount of time. Her professionalism, kindness and encouragement is appreciated.

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

Miei Fiori

Johannah took her time to understand our vision before coming back with suggestions that not only meet our requirements but are relevant, current and forward in it's application.

Rob Greca & Lyly Greca

Sarah Trevathan Coach

The process has been stress-free and actually very enjoyable! I'm also delighted with the finished result of my website.

Sarah Trevathan

What's My Style

I regularly receive compliments on my branding, website and the stunning business cards and cannot recommend Johannah and Confetti Designs highly enough.

Nicky McMillan
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Contact us for an instant over-the-phone quote.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
